title: Tsukuyomi

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You start in your New Moon Form, with Basic Attack and Defense.
-The First Full Moon, you transform to Crescent Moon Form. You now deal Powerful Attack and have Powerful Defense.
-The second Full Moon, enter your Half Moon Form. You will now rampage at your targets house, and gain access to your Hawk Ichibyoshi. You may send It to deal a Basic Attack at another player.
-The third Full Moon, gain Unstoppable Attack and Invincible Defense. Anyone that may survive your attack Is cursed and will be dealt an Overkill damage 2 days later.
Goal: Kill everyone who may oppose you.

desc:
Post 257
*Souls who have fallen to darkness... return to heaven! Moon Shadow Magatama!!*
